author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Vex Customization Options Trailer for Borderlands 4, the upcoming first-person action RPG looter shooter developed by Gearbox. Vex, fulfilling the Dark Siren class in the Borderlands roster, can be customized from head to toe, from glasses, headgear, haircuts, outfits, and, more for players to put their unique touch. See some of her designs in the latest trailer for Borderlands 4, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Vex Customization Options Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'What Time Is It' Teaser Trailer for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the latest installment to the MCU and the introduction of Marvel's First Family. The cast of The Fantastic Four ask the one and only question that remains... What time is it? The Fantastic Four: First Steps is in theaters on July 25.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, they must defen
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'What Time Is It' Teaser Trailer (2025) Pedro Pascal

author: IGN
description:
We hope you’ve been testing your might and practicing your combo moves and animalities, because Mortal Kombat 2 is nearly upon us. This sequel to the 2021 reboot features many returning characters, like Lewis Tan’s Cole Young and Hiroyuki Sanada’s Scorpion, but it also introduces a brand new kast of kombatants. That includes Karl Urban’s Johnny Cage, who looks to be the star of the show this time around. That’s judging from the first Mortal Kombat 2 trailer, which features a lot of Urban’s Cage along with several other new players.

It's time to break down all the characters we see in the new Mortal Kombat 2 trailer, along with the others confirmed to appear in this sequel.

#IGN #MortalKombat #MortalKombat2
title: Who's Who In The First Mortal Kombat 2 Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the American Dad! Bundle Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 & Warzone, the latest title in the first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players can take to the battlefield with cel-shaded aesthetics and absolutely no regard for protocol with Stan Smith and Roger from American Dad! making their way to the front lines. The American Dad! Bundle for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 & Warzone is releasing soon, with Stan Smith being available now and Roger being accessible on July 20 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 & Warzone - Official American Dad! Bundle Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Step into the chilling world of SlackJaw in this trailer for the upcoming first-person escape room-style horror game. As the latest prey of a deranged serial killer, you must use your wits and resources to survive. Explore, uncover secrets, and plan your escape... but be quiet, or you'll be his next victim. Inspired by true events. SlackJaw will be available on PC on August 8, 2025.

#SlackJaw  #IGN  #Gaming
title: SlackJaw - Official Release Date Trailer | Dames 4 Games Slumber Party Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: It’s training montage time! Check out the Donkey Kong Bananza launch trailer for this 3D platformer game to see gameplay, the colorful world, and the journey that awaits. In Donkey Kong Bananza, explore a vast underground world with Donkey Kong and Pauline…and smash your way through it! Set off on an adventure to stop the Void Company and recover the Golden Bananas. Donkey Kong Bananza is available now on Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Donkey Kong Bananza - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Launch Trailer for Killing Floor 3, the latest addition to the first-person zombie shooter developed by Tripwire Interactive. Players will fight the undead in the year 2091 as the megacorporation produces the ultimate undead army called Zeds. Take on waves of Zeds with up to five teammates to earn skills, acquire new weapons, and join the Nightfall resistance to end the reign of the Zeds once and for all. Killing Floor 3 is launching on July 24 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Killing Floor 3 - Official Launch Trailer

title: Mortal Kombat 2 trailer introduces Johnny Cage

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the TactiCon Teaser Trailer for Ex Sanguis, an upcoming turn-based strategy roguelite developed by Lightbulb Crew. Players will engage in dynamic turn-based combat while leading a group of Stillae, elite warriors fighting to save a dying world from the forces of Stasis and restore the flow of life. Ex Sanguis is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Ex Sanguis - Official TactiCon Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Tron: Ares trailer for this upcoming film starring Jared Leto, Greta Lee, Evan Peters, Hasan Minhaj, Jodie Turner-Smith, Arturo Castro, Cameron Monaghan, with Gillian Anderson, and Jeff Bridges. 

Tron: Ares follows a highly sophisticated Program, Ares, who is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission, marking humankind’s first encounter with A.I. beings. 

Sean Bailey, Jeffrey Silver, Justin Springer, Jared Leto, Emma Ludbrook and Steven Lisberger are the producers, with Russell Allen serving as executive producer.

Tron: Ares, directed by Joachim Rønning, opens in theaters on October 10, 2025.
title: Tron: Ares - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Jared Leto, Greta Lee, Jeff Bridges

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Red Band Trailer for Mortal Kombat II, the sequel to the action combat movie based on the Mortal Kombat game IP distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. Bask in the gore-filled trailer with plenty of blood, no mercy, and fatalities galore. Mortal Kombat II is in theaters and IMAX across North America on October 24, 2025, and internationally beginning 22 October 2025.

From New Line Cinema comes the latest high-stakes installment in the blockbuster video game franchise in all its brutal glory, Mortal Kombat II. This time, the fan favorite champions—now joined by Johnny Cage himself—are pitted against one another in the ultimate, no-holds barred, gory battle to defeat the dark rule of Shao Kahn that threatens the very existence of the Earthrealm and its defenders.

Karl Urban stars as Johnny Cage, alongside Adeline Rudolph, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson, Ludi Lin, Mehcad Brooks, Tati Gabrielle, Lewis Tan, Damon Herriman, with Chin Han, Tadanobu Asano as Lord Raiden, Joe Taslim as
title: Mortal Kombat 2 - Official Red Band Trailer (2025)  Karl Urban, Hiroyuki Sanada

author: IGN
description: Skate fans have been dying for a fourth installment in EA’s long-dormant skateboarding series for a very long time, and it sounds like they’re finally getting one in the form of “skate.” which is a big open-world playground full of fun places to do tricks, with realism in in lots of places, but a total lack of it in other places where it’s more fun without it.
title: EA's Skate Is Like Forza Horizon With Skateboards - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Watch the trailer for Mortal Kombat II, the sequel to the action combat movie based on the Mortal Kombat game IP distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. Bask in the gore-filled trailer with plenty of blood, no mercy, and fatalities galore. title: Mortal Kombat 2 - Official Trailer (2025) Karl Urban, Hiroyuki Sanada

author: IGN
description: James Bond fans who always wanted more of Q should check out Quartermaster, a new management sim/base-builder where you run a secret spy agency where you develop gadgets, train agents, and manage your staff. It's in development for PC. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3657070
title: Quartermaster - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After playing Skate for well over five hours, not only we can clearly see the direction developer Full Circle is taking the series, but we can also say that Skate is shaping up to be a game worthy of being the long-awaited sequel to 2010’s Skate 3. Previewed by Nick Maillet

#IGN #Skate #FullCircle
title: Can Skate Revive the Old-School Magic?

author: IGN
description: By swapping to SteamOS from Windows and upgrading to the Z1 Extreme chip, the Lenovo Legion Go S has become one of the best handhelds out there, and a legitimate Steam Deck alternative.
title: Lenovo Legion Go S (SteamOS) Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Unfinished Business DLC Launch Trailer for RoboCop: Rogue City, a first-person action shooter based on the RoboCop IP developed by Teyon. Players will once again explore the streets of Old Detroit as RoboCop to take on the OmniTower as mercenaries have holed up in OCP’s latest pet project, turning each floor into a maze of turrets, traps, and bullets. Fight to the top of the tower, assume control of OCP technology, and engage with a brand-new story packed with new weapons and enemies. The Unfinished Business DLC for RoboCop: Rogue City is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#RoboCopRogueCityUnfinishedBusiness #Gaming #IGN
title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Official Unfinished Business DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Want to become a monkey master in Donkey Kong Bananza for the Nintendo Switch 2? In this DK Bananza tips and guide video, we'll explain and breakdown how to transform Donkey Kong & Pauline into a powerful combo, going over what top abilities you need to unlock first, and why they matter.

From the terrain smashing Punch Power, to the Better Sonar skill which increases your Hand Slap's range, plus the Surf Turf ability and more, this walkthrough will go over some of the best skills and upgrades you can unlock to supercharge your Donkey Kong Bananza speed run.

To make sure you always have the best skills in Donkey Kong Bananza and are up to date on all new releases, stick with IGN. 

#ign #donkeykongbananza #gaming #nintendo
title: Donkey Kong Bananza - Best Skills to Get First

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to the dark future. Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition is out now on Apple silicon Mac models, 16GB+. Watch the Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition Mac launch trailer for this sci-fi RPG from CD Projekt Red, and get ready to step into Night City.

#Cyberpunk2077UltimateEdition #Gaming #IGN
title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition - Official Mac Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Update 2.3 Features Overview Trailer for Cyberpunk 2077, the hit first-person open-world action RPG developed by CD Projekt Red. Players will be able to access new features and enhancements courtesy of the latest Update 2.3, bringing 4 new vehicles, the AutoDrive feature, self-driving Delamain cabs, and more. The game is also packed with updates for CrystalCoat™ and Photo Mode, as well as support for AMD FSR 3.1 Frame Generation, Intel XeSS 2.0, and HDR10+ Gaming on PC, among others. Update 2.3 for Cyberpunk 2077 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#Cyberpunk2077 #Gaming #IGN
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Official Update 2.3 Features Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Donkey Kong Bananza has finally arrived on the Nintendo Switch 2! Up until now, Nintendo mostly on shown very early gameplay for Donkey Kong Bananza leading up to the game's release. In this video Donkey Kong and Pauline traverse through the Refinery, a stage of the game not previously shown off.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Donkey Kong Bananza: 8 Minutes of The Refinery Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
In this thrilling three-part series from Academy Award-nominated filmmaker Darren Aronofsky’s Protozoa, Jane Root’s Nutopia, and Chris Hemsworth and Ben Grayson’s Wild State, Chris pushes himself further than ever — both physically and mentally — as he confronts some of life’s most universal challenges: pain, fear, and cognitive decline.

Filmed across six countries over two years, Chris tests his limits by drawing from cutting-edge science and the wisdom of elders to push himself like never before. With no previous experience, he learns to play the drums for a live performance with GRAMMY Award-winner Ed Sheeran in front of 70,000 fans; scales a dizzying 600-foot climbing wall in the Swiss Alps to break out of his comfort zone and embrace risk; and takes part in South Korean Special Forces training, enduring electrocution and pepper spray to confront his long struggle with chronic pain and reconfigure his response to it — all to uncover tools we can use today to live healthier, happi
title: Limitless: Live Better Now - Official Trailer (2025) Chris Hemsworth

author: IGN
description:
RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on PlayStation 5. Also available on Xbox Series X|S and PC.

"As someone who delighted in blasting through the original RoboCop: Rogue City, my hopes for this standalone Unfinished Business expansion were higher than a junkie on Nuke. However, outside of the exhilarating playable cameo from ED-209, there’s really not enough new here to make another 10 hours as everyone’s favourite baby food-slurping supercop worth going out of your way for. Peter Weller’s deadpan delivery is as endearing as ever, and the cryo gun is an icy blast (though ironically still not quite as cool to use as the Auto 9), but the supporting cast of characters is seriously shoddy and the raft of performance issues on PlayStation 5 make for a bumpier ride than accelerating up the exit ramp from the Metro West carpark. If you thirst for some more Auto 9 bursts flourished with TJ Lazer-inspired twirls then RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business
title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business Review

author: IGN
description:
Ready to dig, fight, and fling your way to victory? In Donkey Kong Bananza, the dirt is your playground and the treasure’s always just one (or five) punches away! In this video, we’re sharing 12 essential tips to help you master terrain-smashing combos, find hidden goodies, manage your currency and collectibles, and make the most of your underground adventures. Whether you're slinging chunks at skeletons or building Getaways with big perks, we’ve got the know-how to help you go full Bananza.

Looking to get started out right in Donkey Kong Bananza? This tips guide covers everything from terrain reset tricks, gold farming strategies, and optimal skill point usage, to the best ways to fight, dig, and upgrade in each layer. Learn how to use Banandium Gems, Fossils, and Balloons efficiently, unlock getaway homes, and chain movement combos like a pro.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Donkey Kong Bananza: 12 Essential Tips to Master Digging, Fighting, and Upgrades

author: IGN
description:
Check out the opening moments of Donkey Kong Bananza! In this video, you'll get a taste of the visuals the Nintendo Switch 2 can deliver in its first open-world platformer – both through its stunning cutscenes and silky-smooth gameplay. All footage was captured on a Nintendo Switch 2 in 4K at 60fps.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Donkey Kong Bananza: First 15 Minutes of Gameplay (4k 60fps)

author: IGN
description:
In today’s Daily Fix: Nintendo has officially revealed the stars of the live-action Legend of Zelda movie. Bo Bragason will play Princess Zelda with Benjamin Evan Ainsworth playing Link. With a release date set for May 7, 2027, this video game adaptation is being led by Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes director Wes Ball and co-written by Detective Pikachu’s Derek Connolly.
In this episode, we go over everything we know so far: the casting choices, characters we might see and what storylines the movie could adapt. What video game story do you think should serve as inspiration?
title: Zelda Movie Cast Announced! Who’s Missing and How Do the Games Connect? - IGN Daily Fix
